name: Phina
description:
Time is running out. 

Without her sacred pocket watch, the Phoenix cannot 

complete her rebirth ritual. But where did she lose it? 

To find out where it went, she.. opens a pawn shop? 

Will somebody find her pocket watch and try to sell it back 

to the Phoenix before it's too late?

Run the pawn shop, polish up old antiques to sell, 

meet the townspeople and find that pocket watch!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game features a minigame where you can buy old antiques, polish them up, and then sell them for profit depending on how well they were cleaned.

There are two main NPCs who you can talk to, who will affect the ending of your game.

There are 4 different endings in total, depending on how you play.

If you struggle to earn enough Gold to buy more antiques, speak to the farmer by the tent to the upper left. She will let you whack weeds on her field in exchange for Gold.

There is also an option for New Game+ where you can use the Gold you accumulated throughout the game to spend on small upgrades for the polishing minigame and the weed whacking area.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- WHILE THIS GAME CAN BE RUN IN YOUR BROWSER,  IT IS RECOMMENDED TO DOWNLOAD AND PLAY THIS GAME  FROM YOUR HARDDRIVE FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE.

Controls:

Keyboard: Up, Left, Right and Down Arrows to move 

 Space or Enter to interact

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Art by: Caz, Marimo

Music by: Karugamo

Sound effects by: Shapeforms, KADOKAWA

Plugins: VisuStella
